comments_since_last_sample.body: I don't know why, and I just figured out what squid games were, all about. Too bad they didn't have a camera with motion sensors. If thieves came out to the property, a few buck shots went off. 😹
Why couldn’t you take ur valuables with you , why can’t u can’t ur security cameras on ur fone ?
Sorry, but she shouldn’t blame the exterminating company for this.  It doesn’t take common sense to know you should secure your home.
Oh come on.. if you have valuables like that you would take them with you.
Subcontractor: "Listen Lenny, the gas will be off fer just one hour. So make it quick. 50/50 just like we tawlk about."

Hide your jewelry be smart! I’m so mad this happened to her. Sentimental jewelry is worth more than millions of dollars. I know my jewelry was stolen by a coworker in the maintenance department and by family.
Even if Terminix said my house was safe, I would've taken out my valuables and made sure my home owners insurance was in good standing. Can't trust every one on a word...🤷🏽‍♀️
And WHYYYY wasn't all that jewelry in a damn safe??? ANY time I have ANY service people in or around my home I lock and put out of sight, any valuables. You cant trust anybody.
bro gonna break in and have to fight a radroach
The price went up for that company to come to your house now
